alert.note: Alert for San Juan County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 26 at 7:10PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills continued. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island and Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: San Juan County; Western Whatcom County
